abstract: A case of spermatic cord liposarcoma is reported in a 40-year-old man. The clinical presentation, pathogenesis and role of sonography in pre-operative diagnosis is reviewed. The role of radical orchiectomy, retroperitoneal lymph node dissection, radiation therapy and chemotherapy in treatment of spermatic cord liposarcomas is discussed.
title: Liposarcoma of the spermatic cord.
